name: InSanity (MomaBoba)
description:
Had a weird dream?

This is one  of the dreams that occurred recently...

I am.. Feeling.. Sleepy.....

Game instruction:

Close door, Hide Under Bed, Look out for the monster (hold Left click to  hide) * dont let that sanity bar drop! , Once finished you could move ! Be wary, once you try to run they will get YOU so quickly find that exit door!
